text: The 20th District of the Iowa Senate is located in southern Iowa, and is currently composed of Polk County. ==Current elected officials== Brad Zaun is the senator currently representing the 20th District. The area of the 20th District contains two Iowa House of Representatives districts: *The 39th District (represented by Karin Derry) *The 40th District (represented by John Forbes) The district is also located in Iowa's 3rd congressional district, which is represented by Cindy Axne. ==Past senators== The district has previously been represented by: *Edgar Holden, 1983-1988 *Maggie Tinsman, 1989-1992 *Jack Rife, 1993-2000 *Tom Fiegen, 2001-2002 *John Putney, 2003-2008 *Tim Kapucian, 2009-2012 *Brad Zaun, 2013-present ==See also== *Iowa General Assembly *Iowa Senate ==References== 20
title: Iowa Senate, District 20
